title: Paytm denies speculations on Jio Financial's acquisition of Paytm Wallet
description: Paytm, in an official release, stated that the news item suggesting such an acquisition is speculative, baseless, and factually incorrect. The clarification from Paytm extends to its associate company, Paytm Payments Bank Limited, as well. According to the release, the payments bank has also not engaged in any negotiations related to the speculated acquisition by Mukesh Ambani.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
